text: 3|120|yadi tumhaara kuchh bhala ho, to unhen bura lagata hai aur yadi tumhaara kuchh bura ho jaaye, to ve usase prasann ho jaate hain. alabatta, yadi tum sahan karate rahe aur aagyaakaaree rahe, to unaka chhal tumhen koee haani nahin pahunchaayega. unake sabhee karm allaah ke ghere mein hain.
